name: Toylogo Interpreter
body:
Functions Implemented

* Implemented Forward, Backward, Move Forward, Move Backward, Turn Left, Turn Right
* Implemented Clear Screen, Reset Turtle, Change color, Change background color
* Implemented Scale 
* Implemented Repeat
* Original Drawings below 
* Also Done a fractal drawing 

***
